participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and supportive, with a calm demeanor.
participant_1.background: I get to work from home, so I can avoid my allergens. I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is. I do not want a job. I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them. I am a graduate student studying law.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, often concerned about loved ones.
participant_2.background: I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble. I can draw. I'm twenty-two years old. I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work. I don't care what my father thinks; I like what I like.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going okay, I'm just worried about my brother.
What's wrong with him?
He's always getting into trouble and I'm worried he's going to get into serious trouble one day.
I'm sure he'll be okay. You just have to be there for him and support him.
I try, but it's hard sometimes.
I know it is, but he's lucky to have you.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
So what do you do for a living?
I'm a barista, but I'm actually a graduate student studying law.
Oh wow, that's awesome! What made you decide to go into law?
I've always been interested in it, and I think it's a really good way to help people.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great lawyer.
Thanks, I hope so!
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw, and I love to fly model airplanes.
That's cool! I've never been able to draw very well.
It takes practice, but it's a lot of fun.
I can imagine.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to read, and I like to spend time with my friends and family.
That's nice. I like to spend time with my family too.
